titleStmt.title: Poetæ Britannici a poem satyrical and panegyrical.
titleStmt.author: Cobb, Samuel, 1675-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. Roper ... R. Basset ... and sold by Mr. Jefferies, bookseller in Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Author's name supplied from Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.

Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
